name: Digidust Corp.
description:
Digidust is an independent digital agency working with mobile apps (for iOS and Android) and web apps while also providing marketing services. Since 2011, we've been developing apps for the web and for mobile devices, with a constant focus on performance and reliability.
Whether we are providing design, development or marketing services, we prioritize the user experience and put it at the center of our work and vision. We make your brand and products more attractive and accessible for your targeted markets.
